data.title: Mack Writes
data.meta_description: Greater Cincinnati-based journalist and writer Mackenzie Manley  has worked on everything from longform features to press releases to content creation to news.
data.text:
I’m Mackenzie: an editor & writer who currently works as Campbell County Public Library’s public relations coordinator. I previously was Cincinnati CityBeat’s arts & culture editor. I’ve written a bit of everything, including features, long-form articles, essays, press releases and short copy.

I'm a cat mom who loves coffee, plants, reading, pop culture, exploring my city and watching movies.

As a former double-major in English & journalism, I'm an Oxford comma neutralist.
